mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_detail ( product_id, cert_no, product_name, expiry_date, approval_date, how_to_take, main_function, precautions, storage_method, standard, ingredients ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{certNo}, #{productName}, #{expiryDate}, #{approvalDate}, #{howToTake}, #{mainFunction}, #{precautions}, #{storageMethod}, #{standard}, #{ingredients} )
mapper.select: SELECT product_id AS productId, cert_no AS certNo, product_name AS productName, expiry_date AS expiryDate, approval_date AS approvalDate, how_to_take AS howToTake, main_function AS mainFunction, precautions, storage_method AS storageMethod, standard, ingredients FROM product_detail WHERE product_id = #{productId}
